identity.name: PharmaFlow
identity.description: A pharmacy management system that feels like a modern cockpit. Clean, sterile, yet approachable and fluid.

containers.card: bg-white rounded-xl border border-slate-200 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200

buttons.primary: bg-teal-700 text-white hover:bg-teal-800 rounded-full px-6 py-2 font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-emerald-100 text-emerald-800 hover:bg-emerald-200 rounded-full px-6 py-2 font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.outline: border-2 border-slate-200 text-slate-700 hover:border-teal-600 hover:text-teal-700 rounded-full px-6 py-2 font-medium transition-all

inputs.default: bg-slate-50 border-slate-200 focus:border-teal-500 focus:ring-teal-500 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 transition-all
inputs.search: pl-10 bg-white border-slate-200 rounded-full shadow-sm focus:ring-2 focus:ring-teal-500/20

cards.stat: p-6 rounded-2xl bg-white border border-slate-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all group
cards.product: p-4 rounded-xl bg-white border border-slate-100 hover:border-teal-200 transition-all cursor-pointer

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1 against background
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings on all interactive elements (ring-2 ring-teal-500 ring-offset-2)

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry and grid tension.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs (p-8 instead of p-4).
Every interaction needs a micro-animation (hover, active, focus).
Use 'Manrope' for headings to give a modern, technical feel.
Avoid pure black (#000000). Use Slate-900 (#0F172A) instead.
Glassmorphism should be subtle: bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md.
All interactive elements MUST have data-testid attributes.
instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the design system using the provided Tailwind config and Shadcn components. Customize the Shadcn components to match the 'Bio-Tech Precision' aesthetic (rounded-xl, teal accents). Use the provided image URLs for placeholders. Ensure the layout is responsive and works well on tablet devices for the POS interface.
